page.title: 15Local Sports and Pastimes 2
page.content: FELL RUNNING takes place on the nearby "Fells" or mountains and involves strenuous ascent and descent on rough terrain on courses varying in length from a few miles to over forty miles.The nearest race of note is the Ennerdale Horseshoe which includes all the peaks surrounding the Ennerdale valley and a distance of over twenty miles. CUMBERLAND AND WESTMORLAND WRESTLING is usually seen at the larger shows. An important part of the activity being the patiently embroidered costumes of the participants. The wrestlers grasp each other round the back,the winner of the bout being simply the one who unbalances and throws his opponent. The event originated in the county and the winner of the main event can proudly be considered "World Champion"
